description: A deliberately slow dashboard that triggers every anti-pattern detected by the Dashboard Performance Advisor. DO NOT use this as a reference for good dashboard design.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, container, instance, namespace, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])))

list.description: Select an instance to filter by
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

list.description: Select a pod to filter by
list.label: Pod
list.name: pod

title: Slow By Design
